basics.name: Reza Babaei
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years building distributed systems and scalable platforms. Built SDKs and infrastructure serving 100M+ MAU. Deep experience in offline-first sync systems, performance-critical paths, and reliability engineering across client and server. Strong background in TypeScript, Node.js, React/Next.js, GraphQL, and cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/Docker).

highlights: Architected a distributed client platform for global field operations under unreliable connectivity and mission-critical constraints
Designed offline-first sync engine with SQLite and background workers — conflict resolution, idempotent writes, eventual consistency
Optimized performance-critical paths via native modules (Java/Swift/Obj-C), reducing p99 latency from ~3s to <500ms
Built fault-tolerant client data flows maintaining correctness during intermittent network conditions
Designed containerized Azure + Docker deployment pipelines with repeatable infrastructure
Reduced bundle size ~40% and load time ~25% through dependency analysis and architecture refactoring
Owned fullstack architecture across Next.js web app, mobile clients, and serverless backend for 50k+ user platform
Led AWS serverless migration (Lambda, API Gateway), reducing infrastructure cost ~50% and API latency ~35%
Designed client–API contracts and caching strategies for high-concurrency event workloads
Built custom asset serving pipeline with caching layers for map-heavy workloads
Improved peak memory ~40% and startup latency ~25% via profiling and hot-path optimization
Developed TypeScript SDK and client platform modules serving 100M+ monthly active users
Implemented caching layer, reactive state management, and real-time event handling
Architected GraphQL schemas and improved API consistency and documentation, reducing partner integration effort ~60%
Built automated testing strategy across platform modules
Architected high-availability platforms with sub-second API latency requirements
Optimized backend throughput using Redis caching and query optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipelines improving deployment velocity and reliability
Led team of 5 engineers building video streaming platform serving 10k+ DAU
Architected fullstack systems across Next.js/React, React Native, Laravel, and SQL backends; implemented microfrontends to enable modular feature delivery
Redesigned caching and data access layers, reducing API latency from ~800ms to ~200ms (4x improvement)
Implemented Docker-based CI/CD and production deployment infrastructure
